author: felicity
msg: bug 1514: spamd was trying to use "../lib" which is ok most of the time,
but during a "make test" on perl 5.005 it errored out with the "bytes.pm"
error.  so we now check for a "../blib/lib" first and use it if it exists.

author: felicity
msg: bug 1685: we should clean PATH when we start if we're in taint mode.
This fixes a Sys::Hostname problem in 5.005, but it's a good idea
anyway since we won't be able to use PATH unless it's cleaned in taint
